Uses of Class
de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironment

    • Uses of NetworkEnvironment in de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore

      Methods in de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore that return NetworkEnvironment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NetworkEnvironment NetworkEnvironment.createNetworkEnvironment(NetworkEnvironmentSettings settings)
      Creates a new NetworkEnvironment instance with the given NetworkEnvironmentSettings.
      static NetworkEnvironment NetworkEnvironment.getNetworkEnvironment(java.lang.String group)
      Returns the NetworkEnvironment with the given group name or null if no NetworkEnvironment with the given group name exists
      Constructors in de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore with parameters of type NetworkEnvironment 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkBroadcast(NetworkEnvironment owner, byte[] payload)
      Creates a new NetworkBroadcast using the infos from the given NetworkEnvironment's NetworkEnvironmentSettings.
